data.title: Women's lingerie online - Swimwear & Homewear
data.meta_description: Princesse tam tam: Women's lingerie, underwear, swimwear, homewear and nightwear. Fashion and latest trends for women.
data.text:
Are you looking for an alternative to feminine hygiene products during your cycle? Do you want to feel as good as you look, even during your period? Women's period pants tick all the boxes. Period underwear is the perfect blend of convenience and style and you can wear it day and night. It absorbs light or heavy flows with no leaks! Find your perfect period pants and enjoy some peace of mind during your cycle!

Our period pants are your go-tos whether you want feminine French lace from our iconic GABY range or the ultimate in organic cotton comfort from our COTON range.

Browse period pants

BROWSE OUR PERIOD PANT SELECTION

Princesse tam tam has a wide range of period pants to give women peace of mind during their cycle. What sets this feminine lingerie made using eco-friendly and comfortable fabric is that it suits every body shape. Period pants are a real asset to women's everyday lives. Their fit is designed to showcase your body whatever the occasion! The full briefs provide comfort and a sense of security all day long. The outer layers absorb blood into the core layers. Women's period pants give you up to 6 hours of leak and odour protection. Every woman needs them in their lives!

PERIOD PANTS, THE PERFECT BLEND OF COMFORT AND FEMININE FLAIR

You can expect the ultimate in comfort throughout your cycle when you wear period pants. Why? Because period pants are made from breathable, absorbent and comfortable fabrics. They're leak-proof and moisture-wicking so they protect clothes all day long. Period pants give you guaranteed peace of mind!

ECO-FRIENDLY AND PURSE-FRIENDLY PANTS

Period pants are an alternative to feminine hygiene products that are kind to both the environment and your bank balance. Wearing a pair of period pants saves around 250 disposable products every year. They help save the planet and save you money. All it takes is 5 cycles to get your money's worth out of your period pants. They last years!

MAKE LIFE EASIER FOR YOURSELF!

Do you want to do away with moon cups and other period products? Period pants are the answer! You can count on your period pants during your period or post-partum. They're convenient: just wash them in cold water and air-dry them or pop them in the tumble dryer before you wear them again.

PERIOD PANTS THAT LOOK GOOD... PERIOD.

Comfortable and convenient women's period pants look good too. They come in three colours at Princesse tam tam: black, green and blue. Pick up lace and microfibre period pants and feel good in pretty lingerie throughout your cycle!

SHOWCASE YOUR STYLE IN WOMEN'S PERIOD PANTS!

Convenient, stylish, eco-friendly, comfortable... Women's period pants have it all! Join Princesse tam tam to explore its range of women's period pants to wear throughout your cycle. Spend your day looking sleek and stylish in your recycled 100% French lace period pants... period! You can wear your cool and comfortable pants with anything: trousers, shorts, dresses etc. Enjoy peace of mind and wear what you want. It's always a good time to celebrate your femininity in period pants!
